Test Name: Herpes Simplex Virus-1 (HSV-1) Type Specific Antibody, Serum
Purpose: To detect and quantify HSV-1 type-specific antibodies in serum for accurate patient management.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Microplate reader (450/620-630 nm), centrifuge, pipettes, vortex mixer
